rdf:Description.dc:subject: Folklore--India--Madras (Presidency)
Occultism
rdf:Description.dc:description: An overview of the superstitions prevalent in Southern India around 1900. The area covered corresponds roughly to Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh and Karnataka.
